text: Metropolis RFC is an American rugby team based in Minneapolis. The flagship team plays in the Midwest Rugby Premiership, with two additional teams playing in Division II and the social Division IV respectively. ==History== The club was founded in 1992 after the merger of Minneapolis RFC (founded 1960) and Metro RFC (founded 1980). ==Honors== *Midwest Rugby Premiership (USA Rugby Division I Midwest Conference) **2017 *USA Rugby Division III **2011 (win by B-team) ==Notable former players== * Nate Osborne * Joe Scheitlin ==External links== *Metropolis RFC Category:American rugby union teams Category:Rugby clubs established in 1992 Category:Sports in Minneapolis
title: Metropolis RFC
